nodes.text: The Shaltin system was a star system located in the Thanium Worlds sector of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories and Trans-Hydian regions. The system shared its name with the Shaltin Tunnels hyperlane.
The Shaltin system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square S-6.
